mapper.sql: id, hosptal_regist_id,department_id, patient_id, doctor_id, nurse_id,care_level, bed_id, ward_id, create_date,disease_region, update_date, remarks, create_user_id,outpatient_diagnosis,inpatient_diagnosis,sex,idcard,number,patient_name,age,is_discharged,hospitalization_day,pay_hospitalization_day,toll_details_id,rest_deposit,medical_number,deposit_warning
mapper.insert: insert into his_hospital_manage (id, hosptal_regist_id, patient_id, doctor_id, nurse_id, bed_id, ward_id, create_date, update_date, remarks, create_user_id,outpatient_diagnosis,disease_region, inpatient_diagnosis,sex,idcard, number,patient_name,age,is_discharged,nurse_name,phone_number,department_id,care_level,medical_number,hospitalization_day,pay_hospitalization_day,toll_details_id,rest_deposit,deposit_warning) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hosptalRegistId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nurseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bedId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{wardId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{outpatientDiagnosis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diseaseRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inpatientDiagnosis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{isDischarged,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nurseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{careLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{medicalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{hospitalizationDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{payHospitalizationDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tollDetailsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{restDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{depositWarning,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

deposit_warning ,

mapper.update:
update his_hospital_manage
hosptal_regist_id = #{hosptalRegistId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
nurse_id = #{nurseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
bed_id = #{bedId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ward_id = #{wardId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
hospitalization_day = #{hospitalizationDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_hospitalization_day = #{payHospitalizationDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
toll_details_id = #{tollDetailsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rest_deposit = #{restDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update his_hospital_manage set hosptal_regist_id = #{hosptalRegistId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, care_level = #{careLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nurse_id = #{nurseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bed_id = #{bedId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ward_id = #{wardId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, outpatient_diagnosis= #{outpatientDiagnosis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disease_region= #{diseaseRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inpatient_diagnosis = #{inpatientDiagnosis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patient_name = #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_discharged = #{isDischarged,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hospitalization_day = #{hospitalizationDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_hospitalization_day = #{payHospitalizationDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, toll_details_id = #{tollDetailsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rest_deposit = #{restDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, deposit_warning = #{depositWarning,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select his_hospital_manage.* from his_hospital_manage where patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select his_hospital_manage.* from his_hospital_manage where his_hospital_manage.patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by his_hospital_manage.create_date desc

SELECT a.*, b.name as doctorName,b.numb as doctorNumber, c.name as nurseNames,c.number as nurseNumber,d.number as wardsNumber,e.number as bedsNumber FROM his_hospital_manage as a left join his_doctor_info as b on a.doctor_id = b.id left join his_nurse as c on a.nurse_id = c.id left join his_ward as d on a.ward_id = d.id left join his_bed as e on a.bed_id = e.id where a.medical_number = #{parameter.medicalRecordId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
select count(1) from his_hospital_manage where his_hospital_manage.number LIKE CONCAT(#{his_hospital_manage}, '%')

select b.name as departmentName, a.*, c.number as bedsNumber, d.number as wardsNumber from his_hospital_manage as a LEFT JOIN `his-userinfo`.organization as b on a.department_id = b.id LEFT JOIN his_bed as c on c.id = a.bed_id LEFT JOIN his_ward as d on d.id = a.ward_id where a.number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM his_hospital_manage as a WHERE is_discharged = 1 order by a.create_date asc
select his_hospital_manage.* from his_hospital_manage where create_date >= #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and create_date < #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} order by create_date asc
select count(id) as userNum from his_hospital_manage where is_discharged=1

select o.name as patient_name ,o.phonenumber as phone_number,o.sex as sex, o.idcard as idcard ,o.age as age,m.care_level , i.user_name as doctor_name, b.number as number, b.price as price,e.user_name as nurse_name,m.create_date as create_date from his_hospital_manage as m LEFT JOIN `his-userinfo`.user_info as i on i.id = m.doctor_id LEFT JOIN his_patient_info as o on o.id = m.patient_id LEFT JOIN `his-userinfo`.user_info as e on e.id = m.nurse_id left JOIN his_bed as b on b.id = m.bed_id where m.is_discharged=1 AND B.number =#{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select hm.* , b.number as bed_number from his_hospital_manage hm left join his_bed b on hm.bed_id = b.id where hm.is_discharged = 1
select his_hospital_manage.* from his_hospital_manage where patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_discharged = 1 order by create_date desc limit 0,1

select m.*,b.number as bed_number,w.number as ward_number from his_hospital_manage as m LEFT JOIN his_bed as b on b.id = m.bed_id LEFT JOIN his_ward as w on w.id = m.ward_id where m.number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select distinct a.* from his_hospital_manage as a left join his_toll_record as b on a.medical_number = b.medical_record_id where b.medical_record_id = #{tollNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
